Name: The Mirage : Illusion of wish
About the game: The Mirage: Illusion of wish is a game to fight the enemies in order to make a wish. There is a man who wants to save a daughter who is dying from an incurable disease. Then one day an unknown person appeared and talked. When you arrive at the end of the world he has created, you can make a wish. What is the ending of this story in a strange world? The Mirage: Illusion of wish is a third-person shooter.   - You can use 6 kinds of Gun mode .   - You can buy items in the Shop to use in battle.   - You can Upgrade your gun mode by using the Upgrade stone .   - You can learn Abilities by using HP or Black crystals .   - Use the Portal to quickly move to a battle area.   - You can reach a Real ending by collecting all the hidden special items. Currently, this game is Early Access state that is constantly updated. Please read the Early Access Notes for future plans.
